subtitles:
184478 187169 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.
187219 190300 If you wanna get 'em out of here.

191170 193820 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!

208044 210525 Security, we have a
break-in. Get the...

219007 221828 I know who you are. I
know what you think...

221918 225749 If you don't wanna get hurt, keep
your mouth shut and don't move.

225879 231090 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

231180 234661 - Infected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

243233 246404 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

248535 252836 Listen, you sick bastard, we're
taking your torture victims with us.
252926 254496 We'll get you out of here.

254576 259278 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
276632 278763 Get it off! Get it off!

282374 285584 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

294247 297458 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

1003122 1005992 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

1014165 1016735 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1045393 1047613 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1077621 1082362 Man walks into a bar with a
giraffe. They each get pissed.

1084533 1089754 The man goes to leave and the barman says
"Oi! You can't leave that lying there. "

1089844 1093885 He says "No, it's not
a lion. It's a giraffe".

1104498 1107409 You two should get on
like a house on fire.

1114191 1117722 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1122283 1128724 I was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1128804 1132545 Then I wake up today in
hospital. I wake up and I'm...

1158722 1164984 It started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1165074 1169245 Because it was happening in
small villages, market towns.
1170115 1172856 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1172936 1177677 It was in the street outside. It
was coming through your windows.

1181548 1184379 You didn't need a
doctor to tell you that.
1186990 1189510 There was something in the blood.

1190991 1195942 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1203084 1205774 And that's when the exodus started.

1209996 1213647 there were reports of
Infection in Paris and New York.
1216037 1218948 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1221909 1224869 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1227520 1231561 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1231691 1235952 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1237433 1240524 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1241134 1245305 You're the first uninfected
person we've seen in six days.

1263700 1267701 Look, I have to find them. They
live in Deptford. I can walk it. OK?
1267791 1270361 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1285145 1289576 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1292057 1296148 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1300319 1303930 We'll all go and find your
dead parents together, OK?

1318584 1321765 If you want her to slow
down, you'll have to say.

1486158 1490109 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1496550 1501072 parents and my sister, we
went to Paddington Station,

1503682 1509024 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1509684 1512024 I remember my dad had all this cash,
1512114 1515465 even though cash was completely useless.

1516986 1520117 About 20,000 other
people had the same idea.
1525688 1527989 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1530169 1532510 I remember the ground was soft.

1534470 1538861 I looked down and I was
standing on all these people.

1538951 1542902 Like a carpet. People
who had fallen and...

1542992 1546954 Somewhere in the crowd there
were Infected. It spread fast.

1547034 1550384 No one could run. All
you could do was climb.

1551995 1555086 Climb over more people.
So I did that. I climbed.
1555176 1557516 And I got up on top of this kiosk.

1559827 1564778 Looking down, you couldn't tell which
faces were infected and which weren't.

1564868 1568739 Then I saw my dad. Not
my mum or my sister.
1578872 1582783 Selena's right. You should be grateful.

1582873 1588004 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1590705 1593526 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.

1593616 1596967 No, we'll all sleep in
the same room. It's safer.
1699643 1701944 Give me a drink of that, will ya?
1710816 1712907 I'll start working on them, then.

1746356 1749306 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1749396 1751617 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1754878 1757789 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1795668 1797759 Do you have any clothes here?

1800840 1804501 Then get them and get
dressed. We have to leave now.

1804581 1808242 More Infected will be
coming. They always do.

1837029 1840030 How did you know? How did
you know he was infected?

1840110 1844031 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. It was on you.

1844111 1849512 I didn't know he was infected. He
knew. I could see it in his face.

1849592 1853984 If someone gets infected, you've
about 20 seconds to kill them.

1854074 1859205 It might be your brother, your sister or
your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1859295 1864726 Just so you know where you stand, if it
happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1864816 1869038 He was full of plans. Have
you got any plans, Jim?

1869118 1873559 Do you want us to find a cure and save
the world orjust fall in love and fuck?
1876259 1878820 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1937575 1940666 What is it about tower
blocks and shopping trolleys?
1940746 1943837 Stop talking. It's a long way up.
1961802 1963842 Now I do need a break.

1983627 1988939 - Why didn't you say something before?
- I didn't think you'd give a shit.

1990149 1994420 You've got no fat on you and
all you've had to eat is sugar.
1996681 1998941 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1999021 2004113 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

2009854 2012855 Actually, I did have a
can of Tango somewhere.

2090265 2093266 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?
2093356 2095617 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2129015 2132106 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.
2147370 2149671 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2149761 2152802 Why don't you all sit down and...
2152892 2155852 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2155932 2158413 We've got Mum's creme de menthe.

2169416 2172417 - Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2172507 2175377 Nah, the good ones. It's a celebration.
2198163 2201254 I know it isn't much but, well, cheers.

2230042 2235653 Sorry we couldn't spare the water. Same
with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2237304 2239564 You'll have to use the bucket.
2246136 2248747 Have to empty it each morning.

2248827 2252488 Just chuck it over the
balcony. No mod cons here.
2254358 2257489 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2270832 2273223 I'll take the living room. It's fine.

2309933 2313634 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.
2314764 2317585 Probably need us more than we need them.

2328898 2333549 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2333679 2337420 - Because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2341901 2345422 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.

2361466 2364727 You think I don't get
it, but I do get it.

2366597 2370598 And I know I'd be dead
already if I hadn't met you.
2402827 2404867 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2404997 2409088 I thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2409178 2412399 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2428874 2433135 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.

2433225 2436966 Saw it on TV once, but
I can't make it work.

2453010 2456141 Jim, we're not going
to be able to stay here.

2465103 2468844 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2468934 2473495 Salvation is here. The
answer to Infection is here.
2473585 2476586 if you can hear this, you're not alone.

2476676 2481197 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2481277 2483458 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2486939 2491500 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2495111 2499022 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now itjust repeats.

2499112 2501503 - It's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.
2501593 2504503 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2508244 2513026 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2518947 2525029 Sound carries in this flat. Me and
Hannah do need you more than you need us.

2525119 2528250 - Look, I didn't...
- No, it's OK. It's the truth.

2528340 2530860 I can't leave the block
if it's the two of us.

2530950 2534901 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2536772 2541083 If it's a recording, the soldiers
who made it could be dead.

2541163 2544644 - It's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to Infection...

2544734 2549035 There is no answer! It's already
done all the damage it can!

2549125 2551956 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2552036 2556127 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2560608 2566299 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2569780 2575042 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2575782 2577872 So we have to try and get there.

2592006 2595747 Just so you know, I don't
take cheques or credit cards.

2624315 2627315 - What do you think?
- It's the most direct route.

2627405 2632667 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2650281 2652762 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2653632 2657023 You know why? Because
it's obviously a shit idea.

2657113 2661504 So we're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars...

2661594 2664505 It's really fucking
obviously a shit idea!
2700164 2702555 The world's worst place to get a flat.

2702645 2705996 Agreed. I think we'd
better do this quick.
2708517 2710647 I've got the wheel. You're on the jack.

2725261 2728782 Do you hear that? Hey,
hey, do you hear that?

2760790 2765091 Forget the jack, Hannah. There's
no time. Just lift, everyone.
2765181 2768442 Grab hold! One, two, three, lift!

2774884 2780015 - Don't look at them! Don't look!
- I can see them! They're coming!

2790928 2793839 - Get the tyre on, Hannah!
- I'm trying.

2807232 2809673 - Get in the car!
- Come on!

2886173 2889734 Don't take anything that
needs to be cooked, OK?
2889864 2891694 I think you can eat that raw.

2899346 2903868 If I never see another chocolate
bar again, it'll be too soon.

2920312 2923533 Takes out the fire but
leaves in the warmth.
2978457 2981498 Either we do this now or we're walking.
3033731 3036422 Like going on holidays with your aunt!

3134538 3137318 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.
3213298 3216299 I can, like, taste the vitamin C.
3217129 3219910 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3281226 3284927 That you'll never hear another
piece of original music again.

3285017 3289188 You'll never read a book that
hasn't already been written,

3290228 3294059 or see a film that
hasn't already been shot.
3298580 3301841 Um... that's what you were thinking.
3305062 3307323 I was thinking I was wrong.

3318766 3323287 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3324677 3328108 Well, she's got her dad and
he's got his daughter. So...

3330809 3334420 I was wrong when I said staying
alive is as good as it gets.
3338031 3340551 See, that's what I was thinking.

3358336 3362297 It's getting late. We'd
better stay here for the night.
3390655 3393305 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3410130 3414001 Bloody hell. Must've needed a hell
of a prescription for that lot.

3414091 3418392 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.
3421092 3423663 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3423743 3427444 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3427574 3429795 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3442268 3444969 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3446059 3450060 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3526990 3529771 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3585095 3588566 - Did I miss breakfast?
- You'll sleep through anything.

3588656 3593657 - Did you have a fry-up? - We'll
stop at a pub on the way. Door!

3618234 3622755 Our location is the
42nd blockade, the M602,
3630237 3633238 The answer to Infection is here.
3669587 3672938 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3674809 3677119 No fire crews to put it out.
3808103 3812104 I don't understand, Dad. Did they leave?

3812194 3815325 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No!

3822157 3826978 Vehicles. We should check the
vehicles. There has to be something.

3943399 3946319 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3946399 3948880 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
4012157 4014817 Three survivors. One male, two female.
4014897 4018248 I repeat, one male, two female.

4083045 4087916 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
4088006 4090397 So you can all have a shower.
4090527 4093838 You look like you need one. Please.

4113793 4119015 It ain't funny. I got loads of
cooking to do, you fucking Doris!

4127797 4130978 She's lost her dad,
Jim. That's how she is.

4143281 4146852 Oh, don't do that. Come
on, come on, come on.

4150713 4155674 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

4155804 4159715 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
4160985 4163416 I want her to be OK.
4164987 4167157 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
4167247 4170028 It was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4210168 4213689 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4213779 4219871 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4222301 4226473 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to Infection.

4231004 4235475 As I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4235875 4238786 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4238876 4242007 The fire drove hundreds of
Infected out of Manchester.

4255220 4261092 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4265093 4269354 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4269444 4274095 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4277356 4282267 Secondary to protection, our real
job is to rebuild. Start again.
4282397 4284788 The belly of the house. The heart.

4284878 4290139 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4292400 4294530 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4294620 4297791 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4297881 4301922 Don't be fighting. Will you
put that back? Put it back.

4304493 4307494 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4331890 4336981 Mitchell managed to knock him out
cold and we got a chain round his neck.

4344633 4348674 The idea was to learn
something about Infection.
4371380 4374811 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4386424 4391816 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the Infected take to starve to death.
4431566 4434047 You'll have to wait and see
4436437 4439008 We hope it's chips, it's chips

4455442 4458793 Tinned ham, tinned
peas, tinned beans and...

4466405 4468836 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.

4468926 4472147 Absolutely. I was
going to propose a toast
4472237 4475367 but this omelette will do just as well.

4490932 4494843 Jones, did you notice while
cooking that these eggs were off?

4494933 4498323 I thought the salt might
cover the taste, sir.
4505325 4508106 I don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4508936 4514418 I can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4514508 4519029 What a fucking disappointment. I saw
those eggs, I thought it was Christmas.

4519109 4522380 We'll have eggs again. Once
everything's back to normal.
4522460 4525291 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4525381 4529422 He's still waiting for Marks
and Spencer's to reopen.

4529512 4533813 - You don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.

4533943 4537034 If you look at the
whole life of the planet,

4539114 4543255 you know, Man has only been
around for a few blinks of an eye.
4544035 4546466 So if the infection wipes us all out,
4547466 4549777 that is a return to normality.

4553778 4556779 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.
4556859 4560120 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4562990 4568212 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why did
you join the army in the first place?

4570992 4575124 This is what I've seen in the
four weeks since Infection.

4577914 4582475 Which is what I saw in the four weeks before
Infection, the four weeks before that...

4582565 4587997 As far back as I care to
remember, people killing people.

4588087 4591738 Which to my mind puts us
in a state of normality now.

4600050 4603001 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4605962 4609222 I don't want to eat.
I want to bury my dad.

4610133 4613223 He's one of the people
you're talking about.
4617355 4619405 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4671199 4674810 What do you want, a fucking
sweetie? Keep shooting, you cunt!
4691504 4693764 I ain't never seen that in my life!

4716430 4722082 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4722162 4724342 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4726163 4731434 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4733085 4735255 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4741477 4745958 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna
go picking a fight with me, son.

4753700 4756741 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.

4756831 4760262 Then get to it. Jones,
Bedford, go with him.
4770745 4773445 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4776356 4778917 The rest of you, go with him.

4801323 4805534 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4805624 4807144 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4807234 4812405 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be
alive now if you hadn't killed somebody.
4819667 4822798 I killed... I killed a boy.

4834461 4839242 But you had to. Otherwise
he'd have killed you.

4860198 4863989 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4865159 4869900 He said he was going to kill
himself because there was no future.
4869990 4872861 What could I say to him?

4872941 4878123 We fight off the Infected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4879073 4882904 What do nine men do except
wait to die themselves?

4882994 4889125 I moved us from the blockade, I set the
radio broadcasting and I promised them women.

4906690 4908480 - What is it?
- We have to go.

4908561 4910611 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4916783 4918743 We get in the car and we go!

4920084 4924655 No! You're not going to keep them
here! You've got to let them go!

4924745 4928006 You can't keep them
here! Stay where you are!
4928086 4930786 I'm not gonna let you keep them here!
4944700 4947051 I want to give you a chance.
4950882 4953182 But I can't let them go.

4984100 4987021 And Mr Burns says "We all know
what you think, Smithers. "

4987101 4990022 And that was my favourite
joke in The Simpsons.

4990102 4993713 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4993803 4998234 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4998324 5001585 They're sleeping in their
beds next to their wives.

5001675 5007376 But we're here chained to a fucking
radiator because the OC has gone insane!

5008457 5012508 Starting the world again when the
rest of the world hasn't even stopped.
5013848 5016979 Just imagine, just think about it.
5018029 5020330 How could Infection cross the oceans?

5020420 5024721 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

5024811 5027512 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

5027592 5031593 and the rest of the world is
continuing as fucking normal.

5035904 5039465 What would you do with
a diseased little island?

5048247 5052598 "There is no Infection. It's just
people killing people. " He's insane!

5099180 5102261 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

5103351 5108483 You see, I'm gonna have the black
one. And I'm gonna make her squirm.

5108573 5112484 Mitchell, I swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
5116355 5118405 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

5143412 5146843 Come on then, you fucking
pansies. Do me first.
5146933 5149413 No, Mitch. Mitch, just use the gat.

5149493 5152544 - So you're gonna stick me?
- Shoot 'em!

5155365 5158416 Is that how you'd let your
sergeant go out, Jones?

5158496 5160416 - I'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

5160496 5163977 You'll let him stick
me? Like a fucking dog?

5173280 5177241 You stupid cunt! What are
you doing? You wanna shoot me?

5177331 5181502 - You wanna shoot me? I'll kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
5182762 5185593 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

5188073 5191284 - Jones, move it!
- I can see him! I can see him!

5201077 5202947 - Can you see him?
- Through there!
5218431 5221902 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5260962 5264913 The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5265003 5268574 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5268654 5271225 which she certainly has no use for.
5272225 5274046 You can't do it to Hannah.

5274136 5277837 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5291360 5294141 - It's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5294231 5297582 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5316317 5320458 You need to leave me
alone with Hannah. OK?

5322318 5326059 - Listen, right. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5326149 5330281 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5354067 5356937 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5380034 5383995 We're gonna eat these,
Hannah, OK? Come on. Eat these.
5384075 5386205 Are you trying to kill me?
5388646 5391206 I'm making you not care. OK?
5403170 5405820 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5411692 5414262 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5644322 5646803 It sounded like a Claymore to me.

5647843 5651804 All right, I'll go and hit
the floods, take a butcher's.
5654545 5657196 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5670369 5672850 I think they're having an effect.

5688414 5691285 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?

5692025 5695116 Would you be the officer
if Henry was dead?
5695206 5697206 Is that the way it works?

5700767 5704858 I don't think they are coming
back. I think they've been killed.

5723773 5726904 We're gonna get out of
here. Stay with it, Hannah.
5726994 5729825 Don't worry. I feel fine. Really.

5751911 5757432 Oi! Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5765394 5768785 Don'tjust stand there, you
soppy cunt! Get after them!
5791231 5794182 What the fuck you gonna do now?

5820758 5824499 - Defend these stairs with your fucking life!
- Hannah!

6003236 6007637 I haven't got any bullets. I
haven't got any fucking bullets!

6070994 6075825 It's just you and me now, darlin'. But
don't worry, I'll get you out of here.

6075915 6080346 Then we'll find a nice little fucking
place somewhere. Just you and me.
6080436 6082787 And we'll live happy ever after, eh?
6147144 6149624 That was longer than a heartbeat.
6163888 6167409 Listen. Listen. It's not all fucked.
6173200 6175681 We're gonna be OK. It's not all fucked.

6175811 6179112 - I've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
6187634 6191205 Hannah, it's OK! He's not infected.
6191285 6193376 But I thought he was biting you.
6193466 6196156 I was kissing her. Are you stoned?
6198467 6200598 We have to get out of here. Come on!
6298923 6301314 Come on, Jim, breathe! Fucking breathe!
6395038 6397739 You looked all right in this, you know.

6419345 6422696 - I can't hear anything!
- I told you, I heard it!
6478190 6481101 Do you think he saw us this time?
